column1: If you would like to suggest organisations to be added to this list, please email contact@webfoundation.org
This list of organisations was included in an open letter from internet inventor, Sir Tim Berners-Lee, available here: http://bit.ly/hpbdweb

column2: Instituto Beta para Internet e Democracia (IBIDEM)
ITS Rio - Institute for Technology & Society
Women in Global Science and Technology (WISAT)
Digital Empowerment Initiative for Eastern Africa (DEIEA)
Red en Defensa de los Derechos Digitales (R3D)
Tecnología, Educación, Desarrollo, Investigación y Comunicación (TEDIC)
Asociația pentru Tehnologie și Internet - ApTI
Collaboration on International ICT Policy in East and Southern Africa (CIPESA)
ILICIT Africa (Integrating Livelihoods thru Communication Information Technology for Africa)
